post.text: Beautiful evening in Wisconsin- THANK YOU for your incredible support tonight! Everyone get out on November 8th - and VOTE! LETS MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN! -DJT

comment.author: Emily
comment.text: Trump is a slimebag, if you vote for him, then its ok for men to grab your pussy... Hey, if the President can do it, then anyone can.... right?

replies.author: Jacob
replies.text: The people who support trump are brainwashed idiots

replies.author: Emily
replies.text: Cody Cody, can men grab your pussy? How about your daughter? Trump saw an 11 year old girl and said "I will be dating Her in 10 years", at the time he was about 50 years old... if you support him, then you are a sellout.

replies.author: Mikayla
replies.text: Hillary is a sellout to all American Citizens.
